content.webTitle: May sees dozens of festivals in Ardennes, France

fields.headline: Ardennes party
fields.bodyText: They're not a bit like Glastonbury, but during the month of May dozens of festivals will bring a party vibe to the Ardennes region of France. Rather than watching Kings of Leon strum tunes to cowboy-hatted teenagers you'll get jousting and torchlit parades at the Festival Médiéval de Sedan (medieval-sedan.com, May 17-18); sample black and white pudding and the potato dish "naked bottom pot" at the gastronomic Festival des Confréries (Charleville-Mézières, May 3-4); or learn about smuggling at the Festival Contrebande (Revin, April 30-May 1). For something a little more rock and roll there's a beer festival in Charleville-Mézières (May 10-12) or comedy and local bands at the Festival de la Cassine (la-cassine.com, May 30-31) in Vendresse. Details of events and holiday packages at ardennes.com; 00 33 324 560 608.
